ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: to bring you all the skilled magicians.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: And bring the ablest magicians to you."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: and summon every skillful magician from all the cities."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: “To bring to you every expert great magician.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: To bring up to you every well-versed sorcerer."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: That they should bring to you every skillful magician.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: to bring thee every cunning sorcerer.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Who shall bring unto thee every knowing wizard.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: who shall bring to you every skilful sorcerer."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Thot they may bring to thee every magician knowing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: to bring you every expert magician.’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And bring up to thee all (our) sorcerers well-versed."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: To bring up to you every well-versed sorcerer."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: To bring you every experienced magician.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Who will bring you every learned, skilled magician."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [26:37] to bring you every cunning sorcerer’, to surpass Moses in the art of magic.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Who shall bring unto thee every knowing wizard) who is skilful in magic so that they can do what Moses did.
